titles.title: Matewan Flood Control Excess Project Land Disposal Act of 1999
To provide for the disposition of land deemed excess to a project for flood control at Matewan, West Virginia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/3/1999--Introduced. Matewan Flood Control Excess Project Land Disposal Act of 1999 - Directs the United States to convey to the Town of Matewan, West Virginia, four specified parcels of land deemed excess by the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, to the structural project for flood control constructed by the Corps along the Tug Fork River.
